title: Context7 Docs Bundle v1
description: Structured bundle of documentation items returned from Context7.

bundle_id.description: Identifier of this bundle (can be derived from request_id and timestamp).

library.description: Library or framework id for which docs were fetched.

items.description: List of documentation items and examples.

item_id.description: Local identifier of this item within the bundle.

snippet.description: Key code or text snippet from the documentation.

summary.description: Short explanation of what this item is about.

url.description: Link to the original documentation or example.

version.description: Optional library version this item refers to.

score.description: Optional relevance score as provided by Context7 or the agent.

meta.description: Optional metadata such as timing, tool name, or notes.
